details.poem: When Ally gets out of classesHe wears a hat and dark glassesHe plays bass in a street bandHe's the coolest gator in the land!
Most anteaters love to eat bugsBut this little fellow gives big hugsHe'd rather dine on apple pieThan eat an ant or harm a fly!
Hair on his head is quite scantWe suggest Baldy get a transplantWatching over the land of the freeHair in his eyes would make it hard to see!
Bats may make some people jitterPlease don't be scared of this critterIf you're lonely or have nothing to doThis Beanie Baby would love to hug you!
This little dog can't wait to growTo rescue people lost in the snowDon't let him out-keep him on your shelfHe doesn't know how to rescue himself!
Bessie the cow likes to dance and singBecause music is her favorite thingEvery night when you are counting sheepShe'll sing you a song to put you to sleep!
Living in a national parkHe only played after darkThen he met his friend CubbieNow they play when it's sunny!
In the mountains, where it's snowy and coldLives a beautiful tiger, I've been toldBlack and white, she's hard to compareOf all the tigers, she is most rare!
Bones is a dog that loves to chewChairs and a table and a smelly old shoe"You're so destructive" all would shoutBut that all stopped, when his teeth fell out!
Bongo the monkey lives in a treeHe's the happiest monkey that you'll ever seeIn his spare time he plays the guitarOne of these days he will be a big star!
Bruno the dog thinks he's a bruteBut all the other Beanie Babies think he's cuteHe growls at his tail and runs in a ringAnd everyone says, "Oh, how darling!"
All day long Bubbles likes to swimShe never gets tired of flapping her finsBubbles lives in a sea of blueNow she is ready to come home with you!
His teeth are as shiny as can beOften used for cutting treesHe hides in his dam night and dayMaybe for you he will come out and play!
Bumble the bee will not sting youIt is only love that this bee will bring youSo don't be afraid to give this bee a hugBecause Bumble the Bee is a love-bug.
Black and gold, brown and whiteThe shades of her coat are quite a sightAt mixing her colors she was a masterOn anyone else it would be a disaster!
Licorice, gum and peppermint candyThis moose always has these handyBut there is one more thing he likes to eatCan you guess his favorite sweet?
Chops is a little lambThis lamb you'll surely knowBecause every path that you may takeThis lamb is sure to go!
Claude the crab paints by the seaA famous artist he hopes to beBut the tide came in and his paints fellNow his art is on the shell!
Black as night and fierce is heOn the ground or in a treeStrong and mighty as the CongoHe's related to our friend Bongo!
Coral is beautiful, as you knowMade of colors in the rainbowWhether it's pink, yellow or blueThese colors were chosen just for you!
What's for breakfast? What's for lunch?Yum! Delicious! Munch, munch, munch!He's eating everything by the bunchThat's the reason we named him Crunch!
Cubbie used to eat crackers and honeyAnd what happened to him was funnyHe was stung by fourteen beesNow Cubbie eats broccoli and cheese.
A bear so cute with hair that's curlyYou will love and want him surelyTo this bear always be trueHe will be a friend to you!
Daisy drinks milk each nightSo her coat is shiny and brightMilk is good for your hair and skinWhat a way for your day to begin!
All the other horses used to tattleBecause Derby never wore his saddleHe left the stables, and the horses tooJust so Derby can be with you!
Digging in the sand and walking sidewaysThat's how Digger spends her daysHard on the outside buy sweet deep insideBasking in the sun, riding the tide!
This dog is little but he has mightKeep him close when you sleep at nightHe lays around with nothing to doUntil he sees it's time to protect you!
Listen closely to "Cock-a-doodle-doo"What's the rooster saying to you?Hurry, wake up sleepy head We have lots to do, get out of bed!
The Beanies all thought it was a big jokeWhile writing her tag, their ink pen brokeShe got in the way, and got all spottySo now the Beanies call her Dotty!
He's been eating carrots so longDidn't understand what was wrongCouldn't see the board during classesUntil the doctor gave him glasses
Echo the Dolphin lives in the seaPlaying with her friends, like you and meThrough the waves she echoes the sound"I'm so glad to have you around!"
Fetch is alert at the crack of dawnWalking through dewdrops on the lawnAlways golden, loyal and trueThis little puppu is the one for you!
You know dolphins are a smart breedOur friend Flash knows how to readSplash the whale is the one who taught herAlthough reading is difficult under the water!
Fleece would like to sing a lullabyBut please be patient, she's rather shyWhen you sleep, keep her by your earHer song will leave you nothing to fear.
Flip the cat is an acrobatShe loves playing on her matThis cat flips with such grace and flairShe can somersault in mid air!
Floppity hops from here to thereSearching for eggs without a careLavendar coat from head to toeAll dressed up and nowhere to go!
Nibbling on a bamboo treeThis little panda is hard to seeYou're so lucky with this one you foundOnly a few are still around!
From the trees he hunts his preyIn the night and in the dayHe's the king of camouflageLook real close, he's no mirage!
The Beanies use to follow him aroundBecause Garcia traveled from town to townHe's pretty popular as you can seeSome even say he's legendary!
Gobbles the turkey loves to eatOnce a year she has a feastI have a secret I'd like to divulgeIf she eats too much her tummy will bulge!
She's got the rhythm, she's got the soulWhat more could you want in a fish bowl?Through sound waves Goldie swamBecause this goldfish likes to jam!
As a duckling, she was confusedBirds on the lake were quite amusedPoking fun until she would cryNow the most beautiful swan at Ty!
Some Beanies think Grunt is toughNo surprise, he's scary enoughBut if you take him home you'll seeGrunt is the sweetest Beanie Baby!
Happy the Hippo loves to wadeIn the river and in the shadeWhen Happy shoots water out of his snoutYou know he's happy without a doubt!
Hippity is a cute little bunnyDressed in green, he looks quite funnyTwitching his nose in the airSniffing a flower here and there!
Curled and coiled and ready to playHe waits for you patiently every dayHe'll keep his best friend but not his skinThen stay with you through thick and thin!
Late to bed, late to riseNevertheless, Hoot's quite wiseStudies by candlelight, nothing newLike a president, do you know Whoo?
Hopscotch is what she likes to playIf you don't join in, she'll hop awaySo play a game if you have the timeShe likes to play, rain or shine!
Sitting on a rock, basking in the sunIs this Iguana's idea of funTowel and glasses, book and beach chairHis life is so perfect without a care!
Inch the worm is a friend of mineHe goes so slow all the timeInching around from here to thereTraveling the world without a care!
Inky's head is big and roundAs he swims he makes no soundIf you need a hand, don't hesitateInky can help because he has eight.
Jolly the walrus is not very seriousHe laughs and laughs until he's deliriousHe often reminds me of my dadAlways happy, never sad!
Kiwi waits for April showersWatching a garden bloom with flowersThere trees grow with fruit that's sweetI'm sure you'll guess his favorite treat!
This fancy bird loves to converseHe talks in poems, rhythms and verseSo take him home and give him some timeYou'll be surprised how he can rhyme!
Donkeys to the left, elephants to the rightOften seems like a crazy sightThis whole game seems very funnyUntil you realize they're spending your money!
Legs lives in a hollow logLegs likes to play leap frogIf you like to hang out at the lakeLegs will be the new friend you'll make!
I am called LibeartyI wear the flag for all to seeHope and freedom is my wayThat's why I wear flag USA!
Her best friend Legs was at her house waitingToday is the day they go roller bladingBut Lizzy Lou had to stay homeSo Legs had to roller blade alone.
Lizzy loves Legs the frogShe hides with him under logsBoth of them search for fliesUnderneath the clear blue skies
Lucky the lady buy loves the lotto"Someone must win" that's her mottoBut save your dimes and even a pennyDon't spend on the lotto and you'll have many!
Magic the dragon lives in a dreamThe most beautiful that you have ever seenThrough magic lands she likes to flyLook up and watch her, way up high!
Manny is sometimes called a sea cowShe likes to twirl and likes to bowManny sure is glad you bought herBecause it's so lonely under water
Maple the bear likes to skiWith his friends, he plays hockeyHe loves his pancakes and eats every crumbCan you guess which country he's from?
How do you name a Koala bear?It's rather tough, I do declare!It confuses me, I get into a funkI'll name him Mel, after my favorite hunk!
Once upon a time so far awayA unicorn was born one day in MayKeep Mystic with you, she's a prizeYou'll see the magic in her blue eyes!
Nanook is a dog that loves cold weatherTo him a sled is light as a featherOver the snow and through the slushHe runs at hearing the cry of "mush"!
His name is Nipper, but we call him NipHis best friend is a black cat called ZipNip likes to run in races for funHe runs so fast he's always number one!
With his bushy tail, he'll scamper up a treeThe most cheerful critter you'll ever seeHe's nuts about nuts, and he loves to chatHave you ever seen a squirrel like that?
Ran into Patti one day while walkingBelieve me she wouldn't stop talkingListened and listened to her speakThat would explain her extra large beak!
All races, all colors, under the sunJoin hands together and have some funDance to the music, rock and roll is the soundSymbols of peace and love abound!
Peanut the elephant walks on tip-toesQuietly sneaking wherever she goesShe'll sneak up on you and a hug you will getPeanut is a friend you won't soon forget!
This lobster loves to pinchEating his food inch by inchBalancing carefully with his tailMoving forward slow as a snail!
Pinky loves the evergladesFrom the hottest pink she's madeWith floppy legs and big orange beakShe's the Beanie that you seek!
My little pouch is handy I've foundIt helps me carry my baby aroundI hop up and down without any fearKnowing my baby is safe and near.
Sneaking and slinking down the hallTo pounce upon a fluffy yarn of ballUnder the table, around the chairsThrough the rooms and down the stairs!
She darts around and swats the airThen looks confused when nothing's therePick her up and pet her soft furListen closely and you'll hear her purr!
Like an angel, she came from heaven aboveShe shared her compassion, her pain, her loveShe only stayed with us long enough to teachThe world to share, to give, to reach
What in the world does a puffin do?We're sure that you would like to know tooWe asked Puffer how she spends her daysBefore she answered, she flew away!
Pugsly is picky about what he will wearNever a spot, a stain or a tearImage is something of which he'll gloatUntil he noticed his wrinkled coat!
There is a duck by the name of QuackersEvery night he eats animal crackersHe swims in a lake that's clear and blueBut he'll come to the shore to be with you!
Radar the bat flies late at nightHe can soar to an amazing heightIf you see something as high as a starTake a good look, it might be Radar
Red, green, blue and yellowThis chameleon is a colorful fellowA blend of colors, his own unique hueRainbow was made especially for you!
Donkeys to the left, elephants to the rightOften seems like a crazy sightThis whole game seems very funnyUntil you realize they're spending your money!
Ringo hides behind his maskHe will come out, if you should askHe loves to chitter. He loves to chatterJust about anything, it doesn't matter
Deep in the jungle they crowned him kingBut being brave is not his thingA cowardly lion some may sayHe hears his roar and runs away!
This dog is red and his name is RoverIf you call him he is sure to come overHe barks and plays with all his mightBut worry not, he won't bite!
All day long he scoops up fishTo fill his bill, is his wishDiving fast and diving lowHoping those fish are very slow!
Scottie is a friendly sortEven though his legs are shortHe is always happy as can beHis best friends are you and me!
Seamore is a little white sealFish and clams are her favorite mealPlaying and laughing in the sandShe's the happiest seal in the land!
Seaweed is what she likes to eatIt's supposed to be a delicious treatHave you tried a treat from the waterIf you haven't, maybe you "otter"!
Sly is a fox and tricky is hePlease don't chase him, let him beIf you want him, just say whenHe'll peek out from his den!
Is he a frog or maybe a prince?This confusion makes him winceFind the answer, help him with thisBe the one to give him a kiss!
Snip the cat is SiameseShe'll be your friend if you pleaseSo toss her a toy or a piece of stringPlaying with you is her favorite thing!
Although Snort is not so tallHe loves to play basketballHe is a star player in his dreamsCan you guess his favorite team?
There is a snowman, I've been toldThat plays with Beanies out in the coldWhat is better in a winter wonderlandThan a Beanie snowman in our hand?
Sparky rides proud on the fire truckRinging the bell and pushing his luckHe gets under foot when trying to helpHe often gets stepped on and let's out a yelp!
Speedy ran marathons in the pastSuch a shame, always lastNow Speedy is a big starAfter he bought a racing car!
Spike the rhino likes to stampedeHe's the bruiser that you needGentle to birds on his back and spikeYou can be his friend if you like!
Does this spider make you scared?Among many people that feeling is sharedRemember spiders have feelings tooIn fact, this spider really likes you!
Splash loves to jump and diveHe's the fastest whale aliveHe always wins the 100 yard dashWith a victory jump he'll make a splash!
Ghosts can be a scary sight.But don't let Spooky bring you any frightBecause when you're alone, you will seeThe best friend that Spooky can be!
See Spot sprint, see Spot runYou and Spot will have lots of funWatch out now, because he's not slowJust stand back and watch him go!
Bouncing around without much graceTo jump on your lap and lick you faceBut watch him closely, he has no fearsHe'll run so fast he'll trip over his ears!
Squealer likes to joke aroundHe is known as class clownListen to his stories for a whileThere is no doubt he'll make you smile!
I'm a manta ray and my name is StingI'm quite unusual and this is the thingUnder the water I glide like a birdHave you ever seen something so absurd?
Deep in the woods he lived in a cavePerfume and mints were the gifts he gaveHe showered every night in the kitchen sinkHoping one day he wouldn't stink!
She thinks when her head is undergroundThe rest of her body can't be foundThe Beanie Babies think it's absurdTo play hide and seek with this bird!
Stripes was never fierce nor strongSo with tigers, he didn't get alongJungle life was hard to get bySo he came to his friends at Ty!
Listen closely to "Cock-a-doodle-doo"What's the rooster saying to you?Hurry, wake up sleepy head We have lots to do, get out of bed!
Although Tabasco is not so tallHe loves to play basketballHe is a star player in his dreamCan you guess his favorite team?
This armadillo lives in the SouthShoving a Tex-Mex in his mouthHe sure loves it south of the borderKeeping his friends in good order!
Beanie Babies are special no doubtAll filled with love - inside and outWishes for fun times filled with joyTy's holiday teddy is a magical toy!
Teddy wanted to go out todayAll of his friends went out to playBut he'd rather help whatever you doAfter all, his best friend is you!
Taking off with a thunderous blastTuffy rides his motorcycle fastThe Beanies roll with laughs and squealsHe never took off his training wheels!
Tusk brushes his teeth everydayTo keep them shiny, it's the only wayTeeth are special, so you must tryAnd they will sparkle when you say "Hi"!
Twigs has his head in the cloudsHe stands tall, he stands proudWith legs so skinny they wobble and shakeWhat an unusual friend he will make!
His heart is red and full of loveHe cares for you so give him a hugKeep him close when feeling blueFeel the love he has for you!
Velvet loves to sleep in the treesLulled to dreams by the buzz of the beesShe snoozes all day and plays all nightRunning and jumping in the moonlight!
Waddle the Penguin likes to dress upEvery night he wears his tuxWhen Waddle walks, it never failsHe always trips over his tails!
Join him today on the InternetDon't be afraid to get your feet wetHe taught all the Beanies how to surfOur web page is his home turf!
Weenie the dog is quite a sightLong of body and short of heightHe perches himself high on a logAnd considers himself to be top dog!
This little dog is named WrinklesHis nose is soft and often crinklesLikes to climb up on your lapHe's a cheery sort of chap!
Ziggy likes soccer - he's a refereeThat way he watches the games for freeThe other Beanies don't think it's fairBut Ziggy the Zebra doesn't care!
Keep Zip by your side all the day throughZip is good luck, you'll see it's trueWhen you have something you need to doZip will always believe in you!
